articles.title: Get ready Brisbane... Fans are back! - Brisbane Lions
articles.description: The Queensland Premier announced today 2000 fans would be welcomed into the Gabba for Saturday night’s clash between the Lions and West Coast.
articles.content:
The Brisbane Lions welcome the decision by Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk to allow fans back to the footy under a dedicated COVID Safe Plan for the Gabba.
